result.title: B.Tech Honor's Programe
result.content:
With an objective to bring up top notch competitive computer programmers in India, Amrita University is offering a unique B.Tech Honors programme in Computer Science. Amrita’s B.Tech honors programme is highly recommended for students who are enthusiastic and motivated in competitive programming and those who wish to pursue their career in core computer science research. Amrita’s B.Tech honors programme is operated on a special curriculum and syllabi taught through a fully flexible choice based credit system. The main objective of the programme will be to nurture the programming talent of honors students through intensive training by the experts and participation in the international programming contests like ACM ICPC.

Amrita being the world’s largest regional contest site for ACM ICPC is now focusing on bringing up young and talented students from the country through honors programme and prepare them for international programming contests so that they represent country and bring laurels to the nation.

Visit http://amrita.edu/bth Email: btechhonors@amrita.edu Phone: +91 75981 65385
